name: Two Cubes
description:
This adventure requires 2 players to complete!
You cannot play this adventure alone, the game requires 2 players who own the game to play!

Red, Blue and Purple

You can only touch and interact with the world in your colour! Both players can touch purple, but cannot touch each others colour.

30 Unique Levels

The game features 30 Unique levels, experimenting with different platforming challenges and ideas!

Colour-blind Support

Two Cubes supports multiple types of Colour-blindness: Deuteranopia, Protanopia and Tritanopia!
